name: Ren
intro: Protocol that enables the movement of value between blockchains
introduce: Ren is an open protocol that enables the movement of value between blockchains.Ren's future is seamlessly connecting blockchains as a Layer 0. Developers will be able to build a single implementation of their application, on top of Ren, that gets access to the whole Multichain world. February 2021, The Ren development team joined Alameda Research.
